section.p: A report from the EMS crew to the emergency department summarizing the patient's condition and any remedial actions taken

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11388 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.2"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL conform to Consol US Realm Header2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1:2015-08-01)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DOCCLIN" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:10000)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:10001)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5363)
NEMSIS trace: eRecord.01 /@root should be the OID for the EMS Agency; @extension the internally assigned ID
The PCR UUID can also be used as an identifier in the /@root property, no extension required.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:5253)/@code="67796-3" EMS patient care report - version 3 Document NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10002)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Patient Care Report" which SHALL equal "EMS Patient Care Report" (CONF:11389)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode="N" /@code="N" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.25 HL7 Confidentiality) (CONF:11390)
Default value is "N" (normal)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] versionNumber (CONF:5264)
May be null, and in most cases will not be used. In circumstances where updates are likely, the first instance should be denoted by a versionId of "1."

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] recordTarget such that it (CONF:10004)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole such that it (CONF:10870)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:10031)
NEMSIS Trace ePatient.05 . . . /PatientRole/addr/streetAddressLine (multiples supported) ePatient.06 . . . /PatientRole/addr/city ePatient.07 . . . /PatientRole/addr/county ePatient.08 . . . /PatientRole/addr/state ePatient.09 . . . /PatientRole/addr/postalCode ePatient.10 . . . /PatientRole/addr/country
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:10871)
NEMSIS Trace EPatient.01: root= the OID for the generating EMS agency, or "NI" EPatient.12: root=" 2.16.840.1.113883.3.184" (Social Security Administration) EPatient.20 and EPatient.21: root= the OID for the state department of motor vehicles, found at http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/identifier-registry.html, and reproduced in the appendix "Object Identifiers for US State Departments of Motor Vehicles".
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] telecom (CONF:11621)
NEMSIS Trace: EPatient.18
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] providerOrganization such that it (CONF:5416, R2.1=CONF:1198-5416)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5417, R2.1=CONF:1198-5417)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5419, R2.1=CONF:1198-5419)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5420, R2.1=CONF:1198-5420)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5422, R2.1=CONF:1198-5422)
The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9996, R2.1=CONF:1198-16820)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patient such that it (CONF:10872)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] birthTime (CONF:10873)
NEMSIS Trace EPatient.17
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] ethnicGroupCode (CONF:10874), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Ethnicity Group 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.837 DYNAMIC (CONF:10032)
NEMSIS Trace: EPatient.14
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:10875)
NEMSIS Trace EPatient.02 . . . /PatientRole/Patient/name/family EPatient.03 . . . /PatientRole/Patient/name/given EPatient.04 . . . /PatientRole/Patient/name/given Name sub-elements SHOULD be in the following order: family, given, middle (also "given"). For names from cultures not following the order assumed above, the "family" name SHOULD be populated with whatever name component should be used to sort by. E.g., for a person with a single name, "family" should be used.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] raceCode (CONF:10876), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet RaceCategory 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.836 DYNAMIC (CONF:10033)
NEMSIS Trace: EPatient.14 NEMSIS collects race and ethnicity in the one-question format (see guidance at http://www.whitehouse.gov/omb/fedreg_1997standards), but the HL7 RIM and, therefore, the CDA schema contain separate elements. It is necessary to populate both CDA fields based on the values selected for the NEMSIS question. Further, the CDA model includes a single race code. In order to support multiple race codes as required by OMB, we adopt a second race code entry from the HL7 SDWG namespace. All documents with a race code must populate the CDA race code; if more than one race code is recorded, then the SDWG element may also be populated. No semantic priority is implied by the element selection.
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sDTCRaceCode (CONF:10877), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet RaceCategory 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.836 DYNAMIC (CONF:10034)
NEMSIS Trace: EPatient.14
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode (CONF:10035), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Administrative Gender (HL7 V3) 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:10878)
NEMSIS Trace: EPatient.13
See terminology map in Appendix "Gender".

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] author such that it (CONF:10027)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] time (CONF:5445, R2.1=CONF:1198-5445)
The content SHALL be a conformant US Realm Date and Time (DTM.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.4) (CONF:16866).
The content SHALL be a conformant US Realm Date and Time (DTM.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.4) (CONF:16866).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedAuthor such that it (CONF:10879)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:16787), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:16788)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:10039)
NEMSIS Trace: eResponse.01 (required), eOther.08 (optional)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:10040)
Required for human author; may be null for a software device NEMSIS Trace dPersonnel.04. . . / AssignedAuthor/addr/streetAddressLine dPersonnel.05 . . . / AssignedAuthor/addr/city dPersonnel.06. . . / AssignedAuthor/addr/state dPersonnel.07. . . / AssignedAuthor/addr/postalCode dPersonnel.08. . . / AssignedAuthor/addr/country

Required for human author; may be null for a software device NEMSIS Trace: dPersonnel.09
contain zero or one [0..1] assignedAuthoringDevice such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturerModelName (CONF:16784, R2.1=CONF:1198-16784)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] softwareName (CONF:16785, R2.1=CONF:1198-16785)
contain zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson such that it
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:16789, R2.1=CONF:1198-16789)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson such that it (CONF:10880)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5470)
NEMSIS Trace dPersonnel.01 . . . Person/name/family dPersonnel.02 . . . Person/name/given dPersonnel.03 . . . Person/name/given
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] assignedAuthoringDevice such that it (CONF:10881)
One authoring device is required for the document.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturerModelName (CONF:11630)
NEMSIS Trace: eRecord.02 Software Creator
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] softwareName (CONF:9999)
NEMSIS Trace: eRecord.03 and eRecord.04 (version), concatenated with an intervening caret ("^")

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian such that it (CONF:5519)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedCustodian such that it (CONF:5520, R2.1=CONF:1198-5520)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] representedCustodianOrganization such that it (CONF:5521, R2.1=CONF:1198-5521)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5522, R2.1=CONF:1198-5522)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:5525, R2.1=CONF:1198-5525)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:5559, R2.1=CONF:1198-5559)
The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] @root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:16822, R2.1=CONF:1198-16822)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] representedCustodianOrganization such that it (CONF:10885)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:10886)
NEMSIS Trace dContact.05. . . / representedCustodianOrganization/addr/streetAddressLine dContact.06 . . . / representedCustodianOrganization/addr/city dContact.07. . . / representedCustodianOrganization/addr/county dContact.08. . . / representedCustodianOrganization/addr/state dContact.09. . . / representedCustodianOrganization/addr/postalCode dContact.10. . . / representedCustodianOrganization/addr/country
Optimal address may be where dContact.01 Agency Contact Type is "EMS Agency Director/Chief/Lead Administrator/CEO"
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:10887)
NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.01 @extension is the Agency identifier; @root, if included, the OID of the assigning body

contain zero or one [0..1] associatedEntity such that it

contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SDLOC"

NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.05, type of service requested
SHALL contain at least two [2..*] id (CONF:10890)
NEMSIS Trace: eResponse.03 Incident Number id/@extension is the incident number assigned by the 911 Dispatch System, where the id/@root SHOULD be the OID of the dispatching organization NEMSIS Trace: eResponse.04 EMS Vehicle (Unit) Response Number id/@extension is the unit number assigned by the Agency, where the id/@root SHOULD be the OID of the Agency

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] functionCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProviderResponseRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.80 DYNAMIC (CONF:10052)

SHALL conform to Consol US Realm Header2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1:2015-08-01)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DOCCLIN" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:10000)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:10001)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] realmCode/@code="US" (CONF:1198-16791)
realmCode
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] typeId (CONF:5361, R2.1=CONF:1198-5361)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5363)
NEMSIS trace: eRecord.01 /@root should be the OID for the EMS Agency; @extension the internally assigned ID
The PCR UUID can also be used as an identifier in the /@root property, no extension required.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:5253)/@code="67796-3" EMS patient care report - version 3 Document NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10002)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Patient Care Report" which SHALL equal "EMS Patient Care Report" (CONF:11389)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:5256, R2.1=CONF:1198-5256)
Signifies the document creation time, when the document first came into being. Where the CDA document is a transform from an original document in some other format, the ClinicalDocument.effectiveTime is the time the original document is created. The time when the transform occurred is not currently represented in CDA

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode="N" /@code="N" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.25 HL7 Confidentiality) (CONF:11390)
Default value is "N" (normal)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Language 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.11526 DYNAMIC (CONF:5372, R2.1=CONF:1198-5372, DSTU:806)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] setId (CONF:5261, R2.1=CONF:1198-5261)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] versionNumber (CONF:5264)
May be null, and in most cases will not be used. In circumstances where updates are likely, the first instance should be denoted by a versionId of "1."

contain exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Component2
Conforms to Component2

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget such that it (CONF:1198-5266)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole such that it (CONF:1198-5267)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5268, R2.1=CONF:1198-5268)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5271, R2.1=CONF:1198-5271)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5280, R2.1=CONF:1198-5280)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] providerOrganization such that it (CONF:5416, R2.1=CONF:1198-5416)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5417, R2.1=CONF:1198-5417)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5419, R2.1=CONF:1198-5419)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5420, R2.1=CONF:1198-5420)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5422, R2.1=CONF:1198-5422)
The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9996, R2.1=CONF:1198-16820)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patient such that it (CONF:1198-5283)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5284, CONF:10411, R2.1=CONF:1198-5284, DSTU:808)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Administrative Gender (HL7 V3) 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:6394, R2.1=CONF:1198-6394)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] maritalStatusCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HL7 Marital Status 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12212 DYNAMIC (CONF:5303, R2.1=CONF:1198-5303)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] religiousAffiliationCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HL7 Religious Affiliation 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19185 DYNAMIC (CONF:5317, R2.1=CONF:1198-5317)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sDTCRaceCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Race 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.14914 DYNAMIC (CONF:7263, R2.1=CONF:1198-7263)
Note: The sdtc:raceCode is only used to record additional values when the patient has indicated multiple races or additional race detail beyond the five categories required for Meaningful Use Stage 2. The prefix sdtc: SHALL be bound to the namespace "urn:hl7-org:sdtc". The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the additional raceCode elements.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] raceCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Race Category Excluding Nulls 2.16.840.1.113883.3.2074.1.1.3 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-5322)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] ethnicGroupCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet EthnicityGroup 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.837 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-5323)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] birthTime (CONF:1198-5298)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sDTCSignatureText (CONF:1198-30810)
sdtc:signatureText The sdtc:signatureText extension provides a location in CDA for a textual or multimedia depiction of the signature by which the participant endorses and accepts responsibility for his or her participation in the Act as specified in the Participation.typeCode. Details of what goes in the field are described in the HL7 CDA Digital Signature Standard balloted in Fall of 2013.
Note: The signature can be represented either inline or by reference according to the ED data type. Typical cases for CDA are:
1) Electronic signature: this attribute can represent virtually any electronic signature scheme.
2) Digital signature: this attribute can represent digital signatures by reference to a signature data block that is constructed in accordance to a digital signature standard, such as XML-DSIG, PKCS#7, PGP, etc.

The sdtc:signatureText extension provides a location in CDA for a textual or multimedia depiction of the signature by which the participant endorses and accepts responsibility for his or her participation in the Act as specified in the Participation.typeCode. Details of what goes in the field are described in the HL7 CDA Digital Signature Standard balloted in Fall of 2013.
Note: The signature can be represented either inline or by reference according to the ED data type. Typical cases for CDA are:
1) Electronic signature: this attribute can represent virtually any electronic signature scheme.
2) Digital signature: this attribute can represent digital signatures by reference to a signature data block that is constructed in accordance to a digital signature standard, such as XML-DSIG, PKCS#7, PGP, etc.

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:10875)
NEMSIS Trace EPatient.02 . . . /PatientRole/Patient/name/family EPatient.03 . . . /PatientRole/Patient/name/given EPatient.04 . . . /PatientRole/Patient/name/given Name sub-elements SHOULD be in the following order: family, given, middle (also "given"). For names from cultures not following the order assumed above, the "family" name SHOULD be populated with whatever name component should be used to sort by. E.g., for a person with a single name, "family" should be used.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] raceCode (CONF:10876), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet RaceCategory 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.836 DYNAMIC (CONF:10033)
NEMSIS Trace: EPatient.14 NEMSIS collects race and ethnicity in the one-question format (see guidance at http://www.whitehouse.gov/omb/fedreg_1997standards), but the HL7 RIM and, therefore, the CDA schema contain separate elements. It is necessary to populate both CDA fields based on the values selected for the NEMSIS question. Further, the CDA model includes a single race code. In order to support multiple race codes as required by OMB, we adopt a second race code entry from the HL7 SDWG namespace. All documents with a race code must populate the CDA race code; if more than one race code is recorded, then the SDWG element may also be populated. No semantic priority is implied by the element selection.
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sDTCRaceCode (CONF:10877), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet RaceCategory 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.836 DYNAMIC (CONF:10034)

If versionNumber is present setId SHALL be present (CONF:6387, R2.1=CONF:1198-6387)
code SHALL be drawn from the LOINC document type ontology (LOINC codes where SCALE = DOC) (DSTU:1338)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ClinicalDocument xmi:version="2.0" xmlns:xmi="http://www.omg.org/XMI" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="DOCCLIN" moodCode="EVN"> <realmCode code="US"/> <typeId root="2.16.840.1.113883.1.3" extension="testString"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.2" extension="2022-01-01"/> <id/> <code code="67796-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="EMS patient care report - version 3 Document NEMSIS"/> <title>EMS Patient Care Report</title> <effectiveTime/> <confidentialityCode code="N" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.25"/> <languageCode/> <recordTarget> <patientRole> <id/> <addr/> <patient> <administrativeGenderCode/> <raceCode/> </patient> </patientRole> </recordTarget> <author> <time/> <assignedAuthor> <id/> </assignedAuthor> </author> <author> <time/> <assignedAuthor> <id/> <addr><city/><streetAddressLine/></addr> <telecom/> </assignedAuthor> </author> <custodian> <assignedCustodian> <representedCustodianOrganization> <id/> <name/> <telecom/> <addr><city/><streetAddressLine/></addr> </representedCustodianOrganization> </assignedCustodian> </custodian> <participant typeCode="DST"> <time/> <associatedEntity classCode="WRTE"/> </participant> <documentationOf> <serviceEvent/> </documentationOf> <componentOf typeCode="COMP"> <encompassingEncounter> <id/> <effectiveTime/> <location> <healthCareFacility> <id/> <code/> <location classCode="PLC"/> </healthCareFacility> </location> </encompassingEncounter> </componentOf> <component/> </ClinicalDocument>
